name: Scratch Clicker: Full Trilogy/Trilogy Edition
description:
Play all of my Scratch Clicker games that I made through Scratch (DUH). I'm not really a game dev, so they are pretty bad. anyways, here are the descriptions from the actual pages: 

SC1: Click on the sprites to get money. Press the spacebar for a boost. (15-second cooldown) when the beetle and on are unlocked, ONLY CLICK THEM ONCE! If you do, it will destabilize the game and crash. there are multiple endings. You can press the flag again to restart.

SC2: Welcome to Scratch Clicker 2! This is a brand new game that was made just like the original, but very upgraded. the sequel includes a lot of things from the first and now includes storytelling and even a title screen. Space still gives you points.

SC3-FF: WW91IGhhdmUgYWNjZXB0ZWQgbXkgY2hhbGxlbmdlLiBmaWdodCBtZSwgcGxheWVyLiBmaWdodCBtZS4g=x 

All version logs can be found inside of the file in case ur curious. Enjoy!
